sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { data_myntra, data_amazon , data_flipcart } from "./data"; function Detail() { const id = useParams(); const [myntra, setMyntra] = useState({}); const [amazon, setAmazon] = useState([]); const [flipcart, setFlipcart] = useState([]); const [img, setImage] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { data_myntra.forEach((item) => { if (item.title === id.title ) { setMyntra(item) } }); setAmazon(data_amazon) setFlipcart(data_flipcart) myntra?.images?.split(',')[0] }) return ( <> {console.log('myntra',myntra)}
{myntra?.images?.split(',')?.slice(0, 6).map((img, index) => ( <> {console.log('index',index)} ))}
{/* */}
